mapper.select: SELECT R.BNUM ,R.RNUM ,R.RCONTENT ,R.MID ,R.RDATE ,M.MNICK FROM TB_BOARD B ,TB_MEMBER M ,TB_REPLY R WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.BNUM = R.BNUM AND M.MID = R.MID AND B.BNUM = #{bnum} ORDER BY RNUM DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_REPLY WHERE 1 = 1 AND RNUM = #{rnum}
DELETE FROM TB_RREPLY WHERE 1 = 1 AND RNUM = #{rnum}
